text: @PressSec @realDonaldTrump Why did Trump ignore the coronavirus pandemic for 70 days? Why did Trump use that time to call it a hoax, say it was contained, go golfing and hold rallies? Because of his dereliction of duty, over 35,000 Americans have died so far. Stop gaslighting America. #TrumpOwnsEveryDeath
